
delete-cluster-security-group
*****************************


DESCRIPTION
===========

Deletes an security group.

Note: You cannot delete a security group that is associated with any
  clusters. You cannot delete the default security group.


SYNOPSIS
========

   aws redshift delete-cluster-security-group
     --cluster-security-group-name <value>


REQUIRED PARAMETERS
===================

"--cluster-security-group-name"  (string)
   The name of the cluster security group to be deleted.


OPTIONAL PARAMETERS
===================

None
